MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH15 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.47am for safety due to a faulty underground cable outside 73 Blackchapel Close and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.50am on the 16th of November 2020.
